channel.title: [HELP] How can I make a new crown? [HELP]
channel.description: I am not 100% sure if this goes here, but I believe this is client sided and I need help with this. Can someone show me how to get to or explain to me how to add a new custom dollar sign for respected donator? Currently I have the "donator == 1" crown (which is a Red Dollar Sign) - I would like to add respected donator "donator == 2" can someone explain to me how to do this? I am not sure how to add it into the client/server :(. Please no flaming. Feel free to add me on msn or email me! Soul_reaper1994@hotmail.com

item.title: [HELP] How can I make a new crown? [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

I am not 100% sure if this goes here, but I believe this is client sided and I need help with this. Can someone show me how to get to or explain to me how to add a new custom dollar sign for respected donator? Currently I have the “donator == 1” crown (which is a Red Dollar Sign) - I would like to add respected donator “donator == 2” can someone explain to me how to do this? I am not sure how to add it into the client/server :(. Please no flaming. Feel free to add me on msn or email me! Soul_reaper1994@hotmail.com
